text:
(Haha, looks like you're feeling good...
...Let's not disturb you...)
I'm sorry, did I wake you up?

No...
I apologize... for the intrusion...

No, it's my fault!
It's okay if you're asleep.

──I wonder,
if you were having a good dream or something.

(Hehe...
Do you understand... how I feel...)

Yes...
Although... I don't remember... clearly...

It was very... warm...
And... pleasant...

The day... you spoke to Rinze...
It has always been like this...

Whether asleep... or awake...
It seems unchanged...

It's warm... and pleasant...
Every day...
